entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-06-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Intermittent `NullReferenceException` from `DefaultHttpRequest.Form` #42100
  • Blazor time to first UI improvement: blazorwasmbenchmark #42096
  • Perf improvement: connectionclose, fortunes_nodejs #42095
  • API Review for System.Web adapters (Part 3): Session #42092
    7.0-preview6
  • API Review for System.Web adapters (Part 2): General Usage #42091
    7.0-preview6
  • API Review for System.Web adapters (Part 1): HttpContext #42090
    7.0-preview6
  • Blazor WASM standalone deployment - Publish Single Assembly File #42088
  • Secrets are not being read from k8s mounted folder - AddKeyPerFile - Core3.1 #42086

Closed

  • DataProtection DPAPI NG fails to decrypt values after cloning VM to a different network location #41970
  • Detected package version outside of dependency constraint: Duende.IdentityServer.EntityFramework.Storage 5.2.0 #41897
  • Use ToString() of bool instead of normal boolean strings in HostingAbstractionsWebHostBuilderExtensions #42020
  • Hot Reload is broken! VS 2022 17.1.0 #40527
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Add Java client implementation for client results #41953
  • Kestrel does not allow spaces after the request line #41824
    6.0.7
  • Kestrel support for WebSockets over HTTP/2 #7801
    7.0-preview6
  • Help on #41471 use my own NewtonsoftJsonInputFormatter #41883
    6.0.x
  • [dotnet-watch] E2E tests for dotnet-watch #41713
    .NET 7 Planning
  • JSRuntime "open" with "_blank" throws TaskCanceledException 60 seconds later #41934
    .NET 7 Planning
  • [Release/6.0] Quarantine ShadowCopyCleansUpOlderFolders #41853
    Test failures
  • `app.UseSpa` should serve `DefaultPageStaticFile` with `cache-control: no-cache` to avoid cache trap #42069
  • Perf improvement: https, json #42080
  • Build the Kestrel.Transport.Sockets nuget package #42067

PullRequests

Created

  • modify the route to display username and date #42099
    area-runtime
  • [WIP] Adding the rest of WebTransport into Kestrel #42097
    area-runtime
  • Update branding to 2.1.36 #42094
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 2.1.x
  • Add debugging of repeated config issues #42085
    investigate, area-infrastructure, * NO MERGE *, 6.0.x

Merged

  • Reset Upgraded state for re-used streams #42098
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview6
  • Backport 39275 to release/6.0 #41993
    Servicing-approved, area-web-frameworks, 6.0.7
  • Implement Http/2 WebSockets #41558
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview6
  • release/6.0 Quarantine all but pri 0 shadow copy test #41738
    area-runtime, tell-mode, 6.0.x

Updated

  • Update SDK #41798
    area-infrastructure
  • Use Vector instead of direct Intrinsics #41790
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Update project templates to replace DateTime with DateOnly #42084
    area-mvc, area-blazor, feature-templates, 7.0-preview6
  • Empty Blazor Server Project Template #42079
    area-mvc, area-blazor, feature-templates, 7.0-preview6
  • Remove explicit parameterName #42026
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Add `razor-compiler` cross-link on `issues` page #42076
    area-infrastructure
  • [user-jwts] Read and generate secrets ID with SecretsManager #42006
    area-commandlinetools, area-web-frameworks, feature-userjwts
  • Added a new doc for adding projects to the repo #41949
    area-infrastructure
  • [release/6.0] Define `$(HelixTestConfigurationFilePath)` #42031
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.x
  • Updated Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.PublicApiAnalyzers to latest stable #41115
    area-infrastructure
  • catch JS exceptions when using InvokeAsync and throw them in .NET #41916
    area-blazor, community-contribution
  • Clean up test retry list #42074
    area-infrastructure
  • [release/6.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `8ded48c` to `548b13d` #41969
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.x
  • Output caching middleware #41037
    area-runtime
  • [6.0] Initialize Activity with parent ID #41765
    area-runtime, 6.0.x
